content: Stashaway ETF Investments AMA First Investment Asked by AnonymousAsked on 29 Jan 2019Should I use StashAway if I want to invest in US-based ETFs? Are their fees lower than brokerage?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 29 Jan 2019Stashaway charges an annual fee dependent on the aum amount. Whereas brokers will charge a fee for each transaction done (for example my comm rate with Td Ameritrade is 0.015 per share, minimum 5 bucks). It'll boil down to how often you intend to buy/sell the etfs 0 comments0
